enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Registration is reserved for sophomore, juniors, and seniors only.
title: DOHA POLI_SCI 242-0-70 Topics in Political Science

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course provides an introduction to American politics and government. We will explore the history of the US constitution, the three branches of government, the news media, public opinion and political participation, and campaigns and elections. We will follow the American elections with interactive blogs, and end with a comparative and critical perspective on US democracy. An introduction to American politics is essential for students to understand American influence and capacity on foreign policies and current events.

subject: POLI_SCI
